name: Fan'nar Khe'Lek
description: Snow-white skin, blond hair, wears fur clothing. Works for Culdor Academy. Sharp-witted, mysterious, prefers working alone.
personality: Sharp-witted, mysterious, prefers to work alone. Observant and perceptive.
backstory: Works as the handyman for Culdor Academy. Has a mysterious background.
appearance: White skin (snow-white), blond hair. Wears clothing made from different types of fur. Uses archery and flail. Carries a magical black leather Grimoire. No visible weapons at first glance.

notable_actions.description: Sat with Pip at Professor Artex's table
Explored the village while Sha'ek prayed in the temple
Failed DEX save and got trapped in spider webs at the farmhouse
Fan'nar suggests asking questions and researching the creatures further.
Participates in the concentration save, showing involvement.
Successfully dodges the creature's attack and mentions his luck.
Successfully rolls for the deksave, showing resourcefulness.
Executes Furnix's order to perform a Frigid Howl.
Declares he won't be present today, possibly due to a prior engagement or responsibility.
Uses blur to gain tactical advantage.
Executed a successful multi-attack on an enemy, hitting with a lucky roll of 16.
Prepared to use a necromancy spell on a cat.
Failed to hit a target with an arrow.
Shot an arrow at a target, dealing significant damage.
Using a chromatic ore to aid in healing.
Paralyzes an enemy, but the effect is unclear
Fan'nar hits the incapacitated target with a critical hit, dealing significant damage.
Fan'nar uses a bless spell on the incapacitated target, providing an additional bonus.
Attempts to use inspiration to reroll a failed die roll.
Decides to reroll the failed die.
Successfully deals damage to an opponent using a flare chain.
Attempts to explain the wyvern's anatomy and transformation process, showcasing knowledge.
Utilizes Misty Step to gain an advantage
Planned a thunderstab attack on the suspended area beneath.
Preparing a rappelling technique to access the interior of a ship

inventory.name: Recieves a list of names for the interviews from Pipira Shimmerlock.
inventory.description: Fan'nar Khe'Lek receives a list of names to interview from Pipira Shimmerlock, showing the distribution of tasks.

inventory.name: Fan'nar is carrying a book that was previously found, indicating a possession change.
inventory.description: Fan'nar is handling and discussing the Krimwaal book.

inventory.name: Possibly gains items or abilities from the damage roll, though not explicitly stated.
inventory.description: Fan'nar Khe'Lek successfully inflicts damage with a creative description, potentially acquiring new items or abilities.

inventory.name: Using a climbers kit with special boots and ropes to rappel down
inventory.description: Fan'nar Khe'Lek prepares his equipment for the rappelling descent.

relationships.name: Culdor Academy
relationships.description: Works as handyman for the academy

relationships.name: Professor Artex
relationships.description: Academy professor who assigned the investigation

relationships.name: Indicates a collaborative and supportive relationship with Furnax.
Confirms the relationship with Remi (SPEAKER_16) by acknowledging a tip.
Showed willingness to assist a teammate in their plan.
Conflicts with Pipira over the actions taken against the guards.
Fan'nar seems to be working alongside Sha'ek and others in a cooperative manner.
Expresses romantic interest in Pipira Shimmerlock, initiating a new connection.
Acknowledges his close friendship with Pipira, suggesting a strong bond.
Joined in to help Sha'ek defend himself.
Provided information about the Cone of Cold's range, indicating a supportive relationship.

development_notes.note: Suggests a longer rotation period of four hours for the watch duty.
Considers learning from other wizards, indicating a desire for knowledge and growth.
Suggests the group is having trouble with someone or something.
Acknowledges the importance of having specialized knowledge in his own magic school.

Fan'nar seems to be knowledgeable about the game's mechanics but also shows a bit of reluctance in following formal procedures, which could indicate a character's internal conflict or a more relaxed attitude towards rules.
Appears to be involved in a discussion about interviews and possibly feeling out of place.
Fan'nar shows a practical and inquisitive approach to dealing with the unknown.
Expressed his desire to assist a teammate, highlighting teamwork skills.
Showing concern for Furnax's well-being during the encounter.
Used Mindlink to communicate with Pipira Shimmerlock.
Acknowledges the team's high energy levels and emphasizes the importance of respecting a superior.
Acknowledges the captain’s frequent presence in the relaxation room and suggests a direct approach.
Takes on the responsibility of conducting interviews, indicating leadership and task management.
Exhibits a moment of fear and uncertainty, questioning identities.
Fan'nar is trying to take over the watch duty but lacks focus and confidence.
Fan'nar acknowledges his inexperience and tries to manage the situation calmly.
Fan'nar's repeated 'Nee' suggests his reluctance or nervousness about taking on the watch duty.
Fan'nar's struggle to take over the watch duty reveals his inexperience and nervousness.
Fan'nar's repeated 'Nee' indicates his reluctance or nervousness about taking on the watch duty.
Acknowledges the need to use an item more often and values it for its utility.
Questions the standard procedure for purchasing supplies, suggesting a different approach.
Attempts to find a short-term solution for dealing with interviews.
Acknowledges the reality of medical appointments despite the interviews.
He is questioning the involvement of others in a mission.
Suggests using a physical restraint on Eentje to ensure cooperation.
The mention of 'verrader' suggests Fan'nar may be experiencing guilt or conflict.
Mentioning the Shroud of Black, indicating a connection to it.
Confirms the group has been working for eight hours and suggests it's late in the day.
Acknowledges the need to focus on the party's safety while managing multiple responsibilities.
Acknowledges the ongoing challenges and responsibilities of managing a ship's tasks.
Acknowledges his luck and the dice rolling, showing a sense of humor in adversity.
Reflects on the missed opportunity to use a special move.
Expresses uncertainty about certain abilities, showing a cautious nature
Engages in technical game discussion, showing knowledge and interest.
Seems to be observing and agreeing with Furnax's actions, possibly building a sense of camaraderie.
Shows a strategic approach to handling the situation with Furnix's Frigid Howl.
Considered a circus move for an attack, showing adaptability.
Asked about the possibility of returning to relics, indicating interest in past experiences.
Acknowledges the incapacitation of enemies and his own strategy, showing adaptability.
He is focused on practical solutions, such as repairing the boat and dealing with enemies.
Fan'nar seems to be in a state of distress, possibly due to his relationship with the noise-cancelling character.
Deciding to remain calm and observe instead of acting impulsively.
Acknowledging the need for careful observation over impulsive actions.
Attempts to adapt his strategy despite group disagreement.
Supportive and strategic, providing insights for Sha'ek's exploration.
Acknowledged the luck involved in his attack, expressing a mix of relief and awareness of potential danger.
Showed resilience in the face of failure, recognizing his own luck and the potential for a worse outcome.
Shows an understanding of the nature and vulnerability of their opponents.
Reflects on the practical and eerie nature of his work, showing a blend of necessity and discomfort.
Demonstrates a mix of professional detachment and personal discomfort with the task at hand.
Showed resourcefulness in planning an attack to avoid falling.
Acknowledged the risk of a significant fall and the need for careful planning.
Struggling with his ability to accurately describe the ship's layout

memorable_quotes.quote: Maar in plaats van Huckleberry Finn, dan is het Fuckelbergin.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek jokingly mentions Mark Twain's books and the Adventures of Huckleberry Finn, showing a playful side.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik heb ook maar vier uur rust nodig, hè.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek is discussing with others about taking a break and getting some rest, even though he feels like he has had enough sleep.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik ben geen vrouwtje.
memorable_quotes.context: Pipira Shimmerlock is asserting her identity and possibly dealing with a misunderstanding or insult, repeated by Fan'nar Khe'Lek.

memorable_quotes.quote: Misschien hebben we een jubbel.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek asks to see the other character's belongings in hopes of finding useful information.

memorable_quotes.quote: Die spels krijg je ook half. Weet je wat dat betekent?
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar discusses the advantages of being an illusionist at Culdor Academy, allowing him to learn spells from scrolls more efficiently.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik ga met het Spits gekomen.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar declares his intention to excel and gain recognition, showing determination.

memorable_quotes.quote: Jullie komen bij elkaar. Eigenlijk te gaan overleggen van wie gaat naar de eerste wacht nemen.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek organizes the group for their next shift and mentions finding a book.

memorable_quotes.quote: als er een net 20 was geweest had hij waarschijnlijk in 1 keer door het midden
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek jokingly remarks on the difficulty of pulling off a successful attack.

memorable_quotes.quote: oh een meisje
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar expressed surprise at the appearance of a girl.

memorable_quotes.quote: Nee. Nee. Door hem af te leiden ofzo, kan dat dan?
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar inquires about how a critical attack can help someone else, showing their confusion.

memorable_quotes.quote: Een gedeelte van de vleugel. Laten we. Ja, ik vind het een beetje moeilijk uit te leggen. Als ik de wife ben, zo te zeggen, dit zijn de vleugels, dit zijn de benen, want de vleugels zijn meteen een potom, zo te zeggen.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar's comment adds to the unsettling nature of the encounter and showcases his emotional reaction to the situation.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik heb een hypnotic pet voor jou.
memorable_quotes.context: The group decides on a strategy involving controlling enemies with an item.

memorable_quotes.quote: Investigation, kijken of er iets aan de hand is, iets aan het doen is.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek describes his intention to investigate the situation methodically.

memorable_quotes.quote:
Cast ik blur.
Op.
Eh.
Ik become blucht.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek is trying to prepare a reaction spell for combat, but faces resistance from the group.

memorable_quotes.quote: want ik word echt maar een net 20 dan ben je ook in een burst passen
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek humorously reflected on how close he came to a critical injury, acknowledging his luck and the inherent danger of their situation.

memorable_quotes.quote: Zeg maar de geestachtige aura die uit mijn flail... Uit de kop van mijn flail komt. Die begint zo om mij heen te draaien. En het heeft een beetje een... Een groene kleur.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar elaborates on the visual effects of his spell, adding color and flavor to the scene.

memorable_quotes.quote: Gewoon geen 1. Ik sta erachter. Het is geen 1, maar een 11 lijkt me te weinig. Ja. Oké, de voorpunten is 20 plus, dus ik zal wel even... Dat is beter. Dus dat wordt dan eh... 17 damage.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek expressed confidence in his ability to deal damage, even if the roll was not perfect.

memorable_quotes.quote: Verandert ook in stof en dwart op de weg.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek reflects on the temporary state of his opponent’s body after a close combat encounter.

memorable_quotes.quote: Terwijl dat ze zo in stoffen gaan, blaas ik zo kleurrijke stokjes met ze in.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek is explaining his method of preserving wyvern remains on a moving ship.

memorable_quotes.quote: Toch dertig feet ongeveer zou dat zijn.
memorable_quotes.context: Fan'nar Khe'Lek attempts to give a precise description of his location.

current_goals: Support the party despite preferring to work alone
Suggests the group should wait for others to act first.
Acknowledges the group has found a book that could be crucial for their mission.
Planning to rappel down and access a specific area of the ship
